mapper.select: select r.*, rtrim(s.type) as sttype, rtrim(s.stcd) as stcd from rain r left join station s on r.stcd = s.stcd where r.id = #{id}
select id, name, stcd from rain where stcd = #{stcd} order by id desc
select rs.stcd from rain_station rs where rs.rain = #{rain} order by rs.id asc
mapper.insert: insert into rain (stcd, name, create_user, create_time) values (#{stcd},#{name},#{createUser},#{createTime})
